Tulsa.Dove Science Academy: Dove Science Academy is a college-preparatory charter school system in Oklahoma, United States. The Dove schools are founded, organized, and operated by the non-profit Sky Foundation. The first school was opened in Tulsa, for the 2000–2001 school year, followed by the opening of Dove Science Academy Oklahoma City in 2002 and Dove Science Academy Elementary five years after that. In the academic year 2010–2011, the Dove Science Academy school system had four schools, including locations in Tulsa and Oklahoma City.
